tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doc was very friendly and am completely satisfied with the treatment, but really unhappy with the wait time. It was as though the appointment was not required . I had taken the appointment for 11AM, but on the day was called by the staff and told to come by 11:20AM for some reasons, but the doc took me in only by 11:50AM. The staff must respect the time of their patients and once the appointment is fixed they must stick to the time. 

Other than that the hospital is clean well maintained well sanitised *** *** ********* ***** *** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Swati is very thorough and professional. We consulted Dr Swati for my little daughter's tooth ache which was due to a cavity. She was very kind and did her best to keep my daughter comfortable. She was very patient. The post procedure follow up is excellent too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
The ambience and staff at Theethling Dental Care were outstanding. It was our first experience with a pediatric dentist and I couldn't be more pleased. Very kind and friendly staff put both myself and my 9 year old special need daughter felt at ease the entire appointment.
Thank you so much Dr. Swati.
Highly recommend!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very impressed with the hygiene and due care taken at the clinic. They take patients with prior appointment so there is no  patient waiting at the clinic. review: Dr Swati Kadia is superb and has experienced hands to identify issue and fix them. She explains each problem clearly and tells why we need to do these steps to get it fixed. review: The doctor was a very friendly person and made me feel comfortable in my first visit itself. The  hygiene and safety measures taken keeping in mind the pandemic situation was commendable. review:
I am glad to make this visit.
The earlier dentist that I had visited, had kept a bad remark in me. But to my luck, I am glad to make this visit to Dr. Swati. 
It takes experience and finesse to be able to execute any task well. 
I would surely recommend her. 

And the best part is.. Very rarely does any dentist take in complete medical history before you see a patient. That was my stepping stone of trust. 

Thank you.
